## IMarketplace.getBidBufferBps() method

Fetch the current bid buffer on the marketplace contract. The bid buffer is represented in basis points.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getBidBufferBps(): Promise<BigNumber>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;BigNumber&gt;

- The bid buffer in basis points.
